section.title: cwd
section.para: Current working directory. The value of this variable changes whenever the current working directory changes. This usually happens when the attribute 'dir' is used which is supported by tasks and the element 'target'.

section.title: GOBO_OS
section.para: The value of this variable contains the name of the used operating system: 'windows', 'unix'

section.title: is_windows
section.para: If the used operating system is windows then this variable is set (to the value 'true'). Thus you can simply use it in all targets/tasks in the if/unless attributes: ... if="${is_windows}"

section.title: is_unix
section.para: If the used operating system is unix then this variable is set (to the value 'true'). Thus you can simply use it in all targets/tasks in the if/unless attributes: ... if="${is_unix}"

section.title: path_separator
section.para: The value of this variable is '\' if the used operating system is windows and '/' if it is unix.

section.title: exe
section.para: The value of this variable is '.exe' if the used operating system is windows and '' (empty string) if it is unix.

section.title: verbose
section.para: This variable is set (to 'true') when geant is run in verbose mode.
